TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InPlaceHostingManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 在计算机上安装或更新 ClickOnce 部署。

span.span: Install or update a ClickOnce deployment on a computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 编写以编程方式安装 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的程序。You can use to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically. 例如，可以在受控系统管理软件（SMS）环境中使用此类，也可以在需要在本地计算机上执行许多预安装或安装后操作的复杂安装的情况下使用此类。For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer. 通常，需要按特定顺序使用此类的成员：Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order: 1. 创建 的一个新实例。Create a new instance of . 2. 使用 下载部署清单。Download the deployment manifest by using . 3. 使用 检查应用程序是否可以使用适当的权限运行。Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using . 4. 使用 下载并安装应用程序。Download and install the application by using . - 如果按顺序调用这些参数中的任何一个，它们将引发异常。If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception. 可以安装 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序，但不能执行它。 can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it. 此类中的某些方法（如 ）保留用于下载在 Web 浏览器中运行的基于 Windows Presentation Foundation 的应用程序。Some methods in this class, such as , are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser. 若要使用 下载和安装应用程序，你必须确保要安装的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的签名证书已作为受信任的发布者安装在客户端计算机上。To use to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher. 有关受信任的发布者的详细信息，请参阅[受信任的应用程序部署概述](/visualstudio/deployment/trusted-application-deployment-overview)。For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](/visualstudio/deployment/trusted-application-deployment-overview). > [!NOTE] > 当前，在使用 Visual Studio 调试代码时，它会阻止 正常工作。There is currently a product limitation that prevents from working correctly when you debug your code using Visual Studio. 如果使用 F5 键调试 Visual Studio 中的应用程序，则在调用 时，此示例将引发神秘异常。If you debug your application in Visual Studio by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call . 若要使用 Visual Studio 进行调试，请在不调试的情况下启动应用程序，然后附加调试器。To debug using Visual Studio, start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger. 或者，可以使用其他调试器，如 WinDbg。Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 以编程方式在客户端计算机上安装 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序。The following code example shows how to use to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client computer. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建 的一个新实例以下载和安装指定的应用程序。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application.

summary.span: 创建 的一个新实例以下载和安装浏览器承载的指定应用程序。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要下载在 Web 浏览器中承载的基于 Windows Presentation Foundation 的应用程序，则使用此构造函数。This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser. 若要下载使用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署的基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序，请使用 构造函数并将 `launchInHostProcess` 参数设置为 `false`。To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.

exception.span: 只能用于 Windows XP 或更高版本的 Windows 操作系统中。

span.span: can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
Cannot pass for the argument.

exception.span: 使用不受 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 支持的 URI 方案。

span.span: uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri deploymentManifest, bool launchInHostProcess) cil managed
Public Sub New (deploymentManifest As Uri, launchInHostProcess As Boolean)

param.name: launchInHostProcess
param.span: 此应用程序是否将在主机（如 Web 浏览器）中运行。

span.span: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.

param.span: 对于独立应用程序，将此值设置为 。

span.span: For a stand-alone application, set this value to .

summary.span: 创建 的一个新实例以下载和安装指定的应用程序，该应用程序可以是基于 Windows 窗体的独立应用程序，也可以是承载在 Web 浏览器中的应用程序。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 的实例，该实例允许您下载使用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署的基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of that allows you to download Windows Forms-based applications deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. summary.span: 确定 ClickOnce 应用程序是否具有合适的权限和平台依赖项，以便在本地计算机上运行。

span.span: Determines whether the ClickOnce application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

summary.span: 确定 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序是否具有合适的权限和平台依赖项，以便在本地计算机上运行。

span.span: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功返回后，必须调用 。You must call after returns successfully. 除非调用 ，否则不能调用 ，它将返回且不出错。You must not call unless you call , and it returns without error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ，它会在成功 事件处理程序的正文中调用。The following code example demonstrates the use of , which it calls in the body of a successful event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 在 方法之前调用此方法时引发。

span.span: Raised if this method is called before the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssertApplicationRequirements(bool grantApplicationTrust) cil managed

param.name: grantApplicationTrust
param.span: 如果为 ，应用程序将尝试将其权限提升至所需级别。

span.span: If , the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.

summary.span: 确定 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序是否具有合适的权限和平台依赖项，以便在本地计算机上运行。

span.span: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true``grantApplicationTrust`， 将向应用程序授予提升的权限（如果需要）。If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them. 只有在 能够授予这些权限时，才能这样做。This is only possible if is able to grant those permissions. 例如，如果将 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序作为更大包的一部分进行安装，并且已向安装程序授予完全信任，则 将能够授予 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序完全信任。For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust. 如果 `false``grantApplicationTrust`，则不会向应用程序授予任何权限。If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 应用程序向本地计算机下载完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要安装基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序，则需要指示用户自行启动该应用程序;无法使用 方法以编程方式启动基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序。If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DownloadProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)
Public Event DownloadProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 更改应用程序或清单下载状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控制台应用程序中，将事件分配给线程池中的线程。In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool. 因此，可能会按顺序不按顺序接收进度更新事件，随后的事件会显示与上一个事件相比的减少。Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event. 你将在基于 Windows 窗体的应用程序中看不到此类行为，因为 Windows 窗体中的事件将按顺序从用户界面（UI）线程的消息队列中进行处理。You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更新包含在 中的 。The following code example demonstrates how to update a that is contained within a . [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle Execute() cil managed

summary.span: 当且仅当 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序是一个在 Web 浏览器中运行的基于 Windows Presentation Foundation 的应用程序时，才启动该应用程序。

span.span: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.

returns.span: 对应于已启动应用程序的 。

span.span: An corresponding to the launched application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅对可在 Web 浏览器中承载的基于 Windows Presentation Foundation 的应用程序有效（也就是说，它们的部署清单定义了 `hostInBrowser` 的 XML 元素）。This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GetManifestAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 在后台下载 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的部署清单，并在操作完成或遇到错误时引发事件。

span.span: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在此事件完成时接收通知，请为 事件创建事件处理程序。To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the event. 如果调用此事件，并且 未指明错误，则接下来应调用 以验证应用程序是否有权在本地计算机上运行。If this event is called, and no error is indicated by , you should next call to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 方法。The following code examples demonstrate how to call the method. 事件回调的处理程序将检查清单下载是否已成功完成，如果是，则提示用户提供有关应用程序的其他信息。The handler for the event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application. 如果用户同意继续安装，则处理程序将调用 。If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls . 下面的代码示例假定已定义并创建了一个名为 `iphm` 的实例。The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of named `iphm`. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GetManifestCompleted As EventHandler(Of GetManifestCompletedEventArgs)
Public Event GetManifestCompleted As EventHandler(Of GetManifestCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 部署清单已下载到本地计算机时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 的 属性检查 是否已成功完成或返回错误。Use the property of to check whether completed successfully or returned an error. 如果 为 null，则 已成功完成，并且你可以调用 。If is null, completed successfully, and you can call . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 方法。The following code examples demonstrate how to call the method. 事件回调的处理程序将检查清单下载是否已成功完成，如果是，则提示用户提供有关应用程序的其他信息。The handler for the event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application. 如果用户同意继续安装，则处理程序将调用 。If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls . 下面的代码示例假定已定义并创建了一个名为 `iphm` 的实例。The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of named `iphm`. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.

exception.span: 不是有效的订阅标识，或者不包括名称、公钥标记、处理器架构和版本号。

span.span: is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UninstallCustomUXApplication(string subscriptionId) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UninstallCustomUXApplication (subscriptionId As String)

param.name: subscriptionId
param.span: 一个包含订阅标识符的字符串，指示要移除的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序。

span.span: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.

summary.span: 删除 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序，该应用程序包含 <customUX> 元素。

span.span: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法卸载以前安装的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序，该应用程序使用[<入口点> 元素](/visualstudio/deployment/entrypoint-element-clickonce-application)中的 `` 元素。This method uninstalls a previously installed [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that uses the `` element in the [<entryPoint> Element](/visualstudio/deployment/entrypoint-element-clickonce-application). 如果自定义安装程序不创建 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的 "添加或删除程序" 条目，则必须在安装过程中存储在 属性中找到的订阅标识符。Custom installers that do not create an Add or Remove Programs entry for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application must store the subscription identifier found in the property during installation.
